title: Sophos
extract: Sophos may refer to: ... SOPHOS, a Guatemalan bookstore. Agathos kai sophos, a phrase used by Plato meaning "good and wise" Sage (sophos), a philosophic term for someone who has attained wisdom.
extract_html: Sophos may refer to: ... SOPHOS, a Guatemalan bookstore. Agathos kai sophos, a phrase used by Plato meaning "good and wise" Sage (sophos), a philosophic term for someone who has attained wisdom.
